pr_title: fix: Implement atomic mode OBJECTS to commit only valid DTOs

timeline.message: fix: [DHIS2-9271] Implement atomic mode OBJECTS to commit only valid DTOs

timeline.bodyText: is "invalidDtos" a better name? or maybe there is a reason for the naming. Just curious.
timeline.author: ameenhere

replies.bodyText:
It was probably validDtos and then I added the not.
InvalidDtos makes much more sense :)
replies.author: enricocolasante

timeline.author: ameenhere
